catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 477
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: colorful images of a monk traveling, walking among sick and ailing people, walking among laborers, etc.; temple complex pictured; interspersed with text
medium: Ink printed on paper with hand-applied color
portfolio: From Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya (Kōya Daishi gyōjō zuga 高野大師行状図画)
title: Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya, vol. 7
